cyclone.name: BETA
cyclone.current_location: about 110 miles ESE of Port O'Connor, Texas
cyclone.trajectory: tracking west-northwest toward the central Texas coast, then forecast to slow, turn north and northeast inland over southeast Texas

weather_observation.watch_coast: Baffin Bay to Port Aransas, Texas
weather_observation.warning_coast: Port Aransas, Texas to Morgan City, Louisiana
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Middle and upper Texas coast and southwestern Louisiana coast
weather_observation.wind: Occasional tropical-storm-force gusts possible (sustained winds generally 25–35 mph, gusts 40 mph+) especially Monday afternoon through early Tuesday.
weather_observation.storm_surge: 1–3 ft of inundation possible in Corpus Christi Bay and adjacent bays Monday into Tuesday.
weather_observation.rainfall: 6–12 inches with isolated 15 inches possible; flash and urban flooding likely.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Dangerous surf and rip currents; isolated tornadoes possible in rain bands.
